description: This file is a shell script used for controlling wireless hotspot functionality, including restarting hostapd processes, managing network interfaces, and toggling hotspot settings based on configuration parameters.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service by killing existing processes and reinitializing network interfaces.

methods.name: Hostapd_Restart
methods.description: Restarts hostapd service by killing the process and bringing interfaces up.
